original_text: After hoisting it up, they used supports to undergird the ship. Then, fearing that they would run aground on the Syrtis, they lowered the gear, and thus they were driven along.
korean_text: 끌어 올리고 줄을 가지고 선체를 둘러 감고 스르디스에 걸릴까 두려워하여 연장을 내리고 그냥 쫓겨가더니

sentences.original_text: they used supports to undergird the ship.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 배를 받치기 위해 지지대를 사용했다.

sentences.original_text: fearing that they would run aground on the Syrtis,
and thus they were driven along.
